description: Sends email replies via Gmail using the user's authenticated Gmail account. Takes recipient email, subject line, and email body as input and sends the email through Gmail API.

example_response.recipient: The email address the email was sent to
example_response.subject: The subject line used
example_response.message_id: The Gmail message ID if available, empty string otherwise
example_response.error_message: Error description if sending failed, empty string if successful
